name: Water I
core: A first current suggests the matter should be approached through listening, receptivity, and careful adaptation.
shadow: Receptivity becomes drift when every influence is allowed to redirect the course.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward a responsive first step that still keeps intention in view.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests settling the waters before choosing a direction.

name: Water II
core: A joined flow suggests two currents can move together if they are allowed to meet without force.
shadow: Union becomes muddling when distinction is lost in the name of harmony.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward cooperation shaped by mutual responsiveness.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests letting the currents settle before binding them more tightly.

name: Water III
core: Generative movement suggests the pattern deepens when nourishment, care, and continuity are allowed to circulate.
shadow: Nourishment becomes indulgence when care loses all boundary.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward sustaining what is growing through active attention.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests guarding the source before extending its reach.

name: Water IV
core: Still containment suggests that rest, privacy, and emotional boundary are more useful now than expansion.
shadow: Containment becomes withdrawal when nothing is allowed to enter or leave.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward carrying what matters in a more deliberate vessel.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests rest, retreat, and preservation of the inner reserve.

name: Water V
core: A troubled current suggests loss, grief, or disappointment is shaping the present atmosphere and should be acknowledged directly.
shadow: Sorrow becomes fixation when only what has been spilled is allowed into view.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward recovery that begins with honest recognition of what was lost.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests staying with the feeling long enough for it to clarify.

name: Water VI
core: A returning tide suggests memory, tenderness, and restoration may have useful force in the present question.
shadow: Memory becomes regression when the past is used to avoid the demands of the present.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward drawing usable nourishment from what has already been known.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests remembering without being ruled by recollection.

name: Water VII
core: Multiple reflections suggest the field contains possibilities that should be examined before any one is treated as destiny.
shadow: Possibility becomes illusion when desire is allowed to select the reflection in advance.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward exploring options without surrendering discernment.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests narrowing the field before making any promise to it.

name: Water VIII
core: Withdrawal from a familiar shore suggests departure may be necessary even if the next harbor is not yet visible.
shadow: Departure becomes avoidance when leaving is chosen simply to escape the work of staying.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward a meaningful departure undertaken with awareness.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests leaving only after the inner reason is named clearly.

name: Water IX
core: A full basin suggests fulfillment is available when desire is acknowledged without excess or denial.
shadow: Fulfillment becomes complacency when satisfaction closes the door to further truth.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward receiving what is present with gratitude and proportion.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests checking whether the comfort is complete or merely convenient.

name: Water X
core: A completed tide suggests belonging, continuity, and emotional order can now be understood as a whole pattern rather than a passing feeling.
shadow: Wholeness becomes enclosure when harmony is maintained by refusing any disruption at all.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward sharing what has been brought into full relation.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests preserving the harmony by tending its quieter foundations.
